name: Nectar (YukumoHunter, sklarp, Mitza, DeathByAutoscroll, kitsune)
description:
When sweet gloopy sauce is involved, these guys ain't foolin' around. They may not be strong on their own, but together they operate the entire honey industry. I'm talking about BEES of course!!!

Production has been lacking lately, so they need your help to get that gold stuff in customers hands again.

Controls:

Select: Left click

Select multiple: Click, drag and release left click

Move: Right click

Drag scroll: Middle mouse button
